title: Blender for dummies
description:

YouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re in luck! ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s all in Blender For Dummies, including Blender software on the bonus DVD.

Because thereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s a lot to learn about Blender, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll be glad this book takes it step by step. First, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll learn to install Blender 2.48 and think the Blender way. Then youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll start creating 3D objects and setting them in motion with animations and rigging. Soon youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll be texturing with Blender, rendering with Blender, and sharing your creations. YouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll learn how to:
